level.heading: Short title.
level.text: This subchapter may be cited as the "Uniform Fiduciaries Act".

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 8-9
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 8-9, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 21-1721.

level.heading: Editor’s Notes
level.text: Uniform Law: This section is based upon § 14 of the Uniform Fiduciaries Act.
